TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Investeringsprogram for spildevand i Šibenik — Supljak — Kanica (HR-Šibenik)

CONTENTS.P: Project name: Šibenik Wastewater Investment Programme — Supljak — Kanica
Business sector: Municipal and environmental infrastructure
Type of notice: General Procurement Notice

Vodovod i odvodnja doo of Sibenik [“ViO” or the “Company”] intends using the proceeds of a loan from the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development [the Bank] for a project to finance priority investments to extend the water supply pipeline Supljak — Kanica (the “Project”). The proposed project savings which are estimated to be 2 000 000EUR equivalent, will be used for procurement of the following works:
Tendering for the project is expected to commence in the second quarter of 2018.

Contract to be financed with mostly from EBRD loan will be tendered in accordance with the EBRD's Procurement Policies and Rules. The proceeds of the EBRD loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law or official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers and contractors should contact:

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.BLK_BTX: , the municipal water and wastewater company, Address: Ulica kralja Zvonimira 50, 22000

The proceeds of the EBRD loan will not be used for the purpose of any payment to persons or entities, or for any import of goods, if such payment or import is prohibited by a decision of the United Nations Security Council taken under Chapter VII of the Charter of the United Nations or under a law or official regulation of the Purchaser's country.
Interested suppliers and contractors should contact:
